text:
namaqH saha#mAnAya nivyAqdhina# AvyAqdhinI#nAMq pata#yEq namOq 		
nama#H kakuqBAya# niShaq~ggiNE$ stEqnAnAMq pata#yEq namOq 			
namO# niShaq~ggiNa# iShudhiqmatEq taska#rANAMq pata#yEq namOq 		
namOq va~jca#tE pariqva~jca#tE stAyUqnAM pata#yEq namOq 					
namO# nicEqravE# paricaqrAyAra#NyAnAMq pata#yEq namOq 					
nama#H sRukAqviByOq jiGA(gm)#sadByO muShNaqtAM pata#yEq namOq 			
namO# &siqmadByOq naktaMq cara#dByaH prakRuqntAnAMq pata#yEq namOq 
nama# uShNIqShiNE# giricaqrAya# kuluq~jcAnAMq pata#yEq namOq namaq - [  ] 7
